pr_title: Fix Verifier failure when session properties contains execution time

timeline.bodyText: @caithagoras It is possible that a query would run with a timeout that's a lot larger than getTimeout(queryStage). Is this OK? Why? Perhaps, add a comment here.
timeline.author: mbasmanova

replies.bodyText:
Added comment.
Add or override query max execution time to enforce the timeout.

From this PrestoAction class's perspective, it only cares about its contract, that is, run a given query or fail if the query execution time exceeds the given timeout.
From the verification perspective, a long-running query will fail on the control, which will be skipped, excluded from our consideration.
replies.author: caithagoras
